title: 126 Cross St., #3L, Somerville, MA 02145
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 301107829', 'Rent: $4,700 / Month', 'Beds: 4', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Parking:: no parking', 'Broker Fee Paid for by the owner!!', 'No Security Deposit necessary!!', 'Only Last Month’s', 'Rent Deposit to take this space off the market!!', "Don't miss out on this space!!", "Won't last!!", 'The space will be ready for September 1st!!', 'Reach out for a tour!!', 'Marble counter tops, sun-filled rooms!!', 'Washer/Dryer In-Unit!!', 'All appliances brand new!!', 'Closest train =', 'Sullivan Square', '- 4 bed/2 bath (second floor/left side)', '- Brand New Everything 2022 (all high-end finishes)', '- Massive living room open to kitchen', '- Gorgeous white-granite counters', '- New cabinets', '- New stainless-steel appliances', '- Hardwood floors', '- Modern/tiled bathrooms', '- Central heat and AC (with NEST thermostat)', '- In-unit laundry', '- Private deck', '- Door buzzer & intercom system', '- Bike room available for tenants use', '- Private deck!', 'We are Pet Friendly ($75/mo fee, per pet)', 'Brendan Flynn', 'StuartStJames Realty LLC', 'bflynn@stuartstjames.me', '978-994-6252']
